API¶

class seam_carving.seam_carving.Seam_carving(image_path)¶

This class implements seam carving, described by Shai Adivan et al. 2007. It calculates an energy matrix to find path of lowest importance and delete those pixels using dynamic programming.

image_path: str
Path to image
__image : ndarray
image read from given path
energyPic : ndarray
energy matrix
cutImage : ndarray
cuttet image
seamImage : ndarray
Image to plot the seam image
plot()
plot given image and original.
deleteNSeams()
delete given number of seams. Works only colum wise.
calcDiff()
calculate energy matrix
searchSeam()
searches seam to delete
deleteNSeams(n)¶

Delete n seams from original, write result to disk and call plot.

n : int
How many seams should be removed?

None

plot(image)¶

Plot a given image in comparison to originall image.

image : numpy.ndarray
image to plot

None
